acceptance-test-run.title: In Presence of excluded attributes, the Class Info object should not contain those attributes
acceptance-test-run.name: inPresenceOfExcludedAttributesTheClassInfoObjectShouldNotContainThoseAttributes

test-step.description: Given a Set of annotations to be excluded
Given a set of excluded fields
Given a ClassInfo with excluded annotations and excluded fields
Then the Object should not be null
Then the attributes contains in ClassInfo should match the ones contains in the POJO
